system.description: The Space Marine can adopt an unshakeable defensive stance, sacrificing mobility for ultimate protection.
system.benefit: Character can spend a Fate Point to adopt a Stalwart Defence as a Full Action. Whilst in this condition, character cannot move or dodge, however they may make the Parry Reaction against all strikes against them, and they suffer -2 damage. Additionally, enemies gain no bonus from outnumbering the character in close combat. These effects last until the character chooses to end the effect, or is rendered incapable of fighting.

specialAbilities.name: Stalwart Defence Stance
specialAbilities.description: Spend a Fate Point as a Full Action to enter Stalwart Defence. Cannot move or dodge, but may Parry all strikes, suffer -2 damage, and enemies gain no bonus from outnumbering. Lasts until you choose to end it or are incapacitated.
